short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will collect ad hoc evaluations of social media posts as users run across them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By installing and activating the extension, the user is presented with a form of questions to fill in. Extension is collecting the page's URL and title and pre-fills those in the form. By submitting the form the users send their evaluations.
